name: Commerce Funds
body:
### Commerce Funds
This is a fork of Commerce Funds that is aimed at providing a simple credit/debit system to maintain a running customer balance. Drupal Commerce does a superb job at tracking order balances, but for systems that leverage customer credit (think store credit) - you may find this useful.

### Contact
twitter: @kevinquillen
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
